summary: This document is a collection of administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 11, 2019, including official count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms. It details inmate counts, assignments, and movements within the facility on that specific date.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative procedures at the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, including official inmate counts, out-counts for inmates outside their housing units, and work assignments.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are routine prison administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 11, 2019.
They show the facility's standard procedures for tracking inmate population through count sheets, rosters, and out-count forms.
The records list numerous inmates by name and registration number, along with their housing unit assignments (e.g., KS, ES, Z-A) and work details.
The forms include specific instructions for staff regarding submission timelines and proper completion of count documentation.
These documents represent the normal operational paperwork of the facility on a specific day and do not directly reference Jeffrey Epstein or case-related events.
